modules.title: Institutional > Find out why organizations love MetaMask Institutional

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Unrivaled Web3 access with top-tier custody and self-custody integrations

LEARN MORE

Unparalleled ecosystem reach and multi-sig approval mechanisms

LEARN MORE

Holistic NFT portfolio tracking and analytics

LEARN MORE

Secure Web3 access with institution-required custody, compliance, and reporting features

LEARN MORE
How it works
Typical DeFi Investment Process
Assets in cold storage
Approve transfer to a hot wallet
Connect hot wallet to MetaMask for transaction signing
Connect hot wallet to Dapp
Initiate transaction from hot wallet
Sign transaction with MetaMask
Broadcast to mainnet for mining

modules.title: Institutional > DeFi Investments with MetaMask Institutional

childMarkdownRemark.html: DeFi Investments with MetaMask Institutional
Assets held by custodian
Connect to Dapp. Initiate and confirm the transaction with MetaMask Institutional
Transaction is sent to the custodian for approval before signing and broadcast to Mainnet

embed.embed: <iframe width="800" height="450" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PGIxod4pgGg" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

childMarkdownRemark.html:
As a liquid token trading fund, we identify and invest in a diverse number of high-quality tokens with the potential for strong long-term growth—including those in GameFi and NFTs. So what we need is a wallet that aggregates a view of our crypto assets, NFT pricing and data, and liquidity positions in one place. MetaMask Institutional’s portfolio dashboard does all this and more.

Nathanael Cohen

Co-Founder & CIO at Indigo Fund

Strix Leviathan’s Aurora fund was built with sophisticated technical infrastructure to back test and track positions, and connect marketplaces. We needed a wallet that connected seamlessly to web3—and all of web3 works with MetaMask Institutional. We’re confident of MMI’s execution capability. And if something doesn’t work—with MMI, we’re able to solve it right away.

Evan Morris

Portfolio Manager at Aurora Fund, Strix Leviathan

childMarkdownRemark.html: Discover the latest product updates and learn more about DeFi for organizations
Leverage insight from our Cryptoeconomic Research team to generate alpha

Unrivaled web3 access for funds, web3 builders, and all organizations

MetaMask Institutional is an institution-compliant version of the world’s leading web3 wallet, MetaMask. Organizations trust us to manage their web3 access and engagement with institution-required security and operational efficiency.

We simplify capital deployment into web3 applications.

node.headline: How will staked ETH withdrawals impact the web3 ecosystem?

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask Institutional and the ConsenSys Cryptoeconomics Research team have compiled an insight report walking through all you need to know about the Shanghai/Capella upgrade, and what it means for stakers and the web3 ecosystem..

node.headline: Interact with over 17,000 web3 protocols and applications

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask serves over 30M monthly active users and is connected to almost every web3 dapp. Trade, invest, stake, lend, borrow, provide liquidity, and bridge assets across EVM chains.

node.headline: Work with leading custody and self-custody providers

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask Institutional is the only multi-custodial institutional web3 wallet. Integrate with your chosen custody or self-custody provider to help manage key storage, facilitate multi-signature transaction approvals, and optimize trade flows.

node.headline: Access precise on-chain data with our API

childMarkdownRemark.html: Leverage the MetaMask Institutional API to streamline your operations, ensuring efficient management, monitoring, and analysis of your on-chain assets and activities across Ethereum and Solana.
Retrieve detailed valuations and transaction histories across chains and protocols on Ethereum and Solana
Access P&L and performance-related data on open positions through our vast universe of DeFi adapters
High reliability with endpoints optimized for minimal latency and a robust 99.99% uptime, ensuring your operations run smoothly without interruption.
Powerful web3 institutional controls, portfolio management, digital asset monitoring, and transaction reporting, all on one dashboard.
Careful control over how your team and organization engages in web3
Web3 access and opportunities brought together in one dashboard
A consolidated view of your organisation’s web3 assets, including performance attribution
Comprehensive asset coverage and streamlined transaction reporting to fund administrators, liquidity providers, and other stakeholders
